title: Innovation Strategy for University Learning Approaches Based on Integrated Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of university education systems and online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Need for flexible learning design to strengthen workplace relevance for current practitioners. Goal to optimize performance through interaction analysis between attendance rates and online participation

learning_goals: Participants establish self-directed learning plans in blended environments and achieve an 80%+ implementation rate
Learners analyze the balance between attendance activities and online resource utilization to improve individual learning efficiency by 25%
By the end of training, over 90% of participants can present integrated blended strategy application cases in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
